channel.title: Slayer system help
channel.description: Hello i've got a 667 source called Extinction, It has the slayer master and shop. I added items to the shop but the only way to buy them is with coins, There is no slayer point system. I need help creating one(I cannot find PlayerSave) I don't think it has a file
